mapper.insert: insert into admin(id, uid, username, phone, email, createtime, updatetime, password) values (#{id}, #{uid}, #{username}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{password})
mapper.update: update admin set username=#{username}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, updatetime=#{updatetime}, password=#{password} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from admin order by id desc

select * from admin
uid like concat('%', #{uid}, '%')
username like concat('%', #{username}, '%')
phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%')
email like concat('%', #{email}, '%')
order by id desc
